valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 21 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 22 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: High 250 miles west of north FitzRoy 1033 expected northeast Shannon with little change by midday tomorrow
